name: cross-device-snake-game
description: A modern Snake game with cross-device multiplayer functionality using Firebase

scripts.lint: node -c app.js && echo 'JavaScript syntax check passed'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:html && npm run test:config
scripts.test:html: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const html=fs.readFileSync('index.html','utf8'); if(!html.includes('<!DOCTYPE html>')) throw new Error('HTML DOCTYPE missing')" && echo 'HTML validation passed'
scripts.test:config: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const js=fs.readFileSync('app.js','utf8'); if(!js.includes('firebaseConfig')) throw new Error('Firebase config not found')" && echo 'Config validation passed'
scripts.build: echo 'No build process configured - serving static files'
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test:html && npm run test:config
